comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Edward Renz was a champion speed walker, a member of the Mohawk Athletic Club at Celtic Park, New York City.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Feb 1, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F40812FE355B13738... reports that men have been practicing for the walking race from City Hall to Coney Island that will take place on Washington's birthday. Renz is to race and Erwig is mentioned as showing up well on a practice walk.
